entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Set Browsable property value at runtime by reflection #86544
  • [Profiler] Non-blocking garbage collections are not reported as induced #86541
  • JIT: Audit `GetAllSuccs`/`GetEHSuccs` when filters are involved #86538
  • JIT: hoist loop invariant null checks (and other exception causing trees) if they happen before other side effects #86536

Closed

  • PipeReader.CopyToAsync(Stream) sometimes does a zero length write #85733
  • [API Proposal]: System.Net.HttpStatusCode.UnprocessableContent #70996
    8.0.0
  • Configuration Binding a dictionary with a key that has empty value skips the key as well #66229
    Future
  • JIT: JIT/Methodical/explicit/coverage/expl_gc_val_1_d/expl_gc_val_1_d failing under random jit stress #74878
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: `GC.IgnoreTransitionSuppression(void*)` #86525
  • Unable to use hosting APIs to load managed assemblies from an ICorProfilerCallback implementation #84143
    8.0.0
  • ThreadPool consumes about 10 or up to 20 percent CPU when application is completely idle #80746
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Define parameter marshalling of interfaces #85797
    8.0.0
  • OSR + dynamic PGO not optimizing interface dispatch as expected #74081
    8.0.0
  • SOS DumpIL command unable to decode the IL of a PInvoke or ReversePInvoke IL Stub #11317
    Future
  • Subsequent hostedServices are not getting started with StartAsync #78135
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Switch basic block successors to a visitor pattern #86543
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add the ability to set Browsable property value in runtime by reflection #86542
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Vectorize shorter buffers for CRC-32 on Intel #86539
    area-System.IO, community-contribution

Merged

  • avoid GCHandle in ConnectEx and SendTo on Windows #86524
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-windows, 8.0.0
  • PipeReader.CopyToAsync(Stream) should not perform zero-length writes #85768
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • UnprocessableContent HTTP 422 alias #85841
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Clean up GenTreeCall's inline info #86540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • fix(66229): Fix invalid processing of empty Dictionary node. #86485
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] delete the rsGetRsvdReg() for LA64. #86319
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [interp] Remove char element type support from transform-simd #86534
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Allow using active host context in hostfxr_get_runtime_delegate #86460
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Remove references to P/Invokes and DllImport from resource strings in ComInterfaceGenerator #85178
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Make the RefreshMemoryLimit API public #85549
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ensure Vector2/3/4, Quaternion, and Plane don't have a false dependency on Vector<T> #86481
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add marshallers for GeneratedComInterface-based types #86177
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation

Updated

  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2184861 #86535
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Warn if StringMarshalling doesn't match base and warn if base interface cannot be generated #86467
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix branch #86482
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Fold const WithElement to CNS_VEC #86212
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fixing the InstructionSetDesc implications #86486
    needs-area-label
  • Allow the user to control the MaxVectorTBitWidth #85551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Add request metrics to System.Net.Http #85447
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Improve the performance of the type loader through various tweaks #85743
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Delete `GT_ASG` #85871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Optimized conversions between `Half` and `Single`. #81632
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Clone files on OSX-like platforms when possible, instead of copying the whole file #79243
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • StringBuilder: use Span.Fill in Append repeating char #86287
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Add PipeOptions.FirstPipeInstance enum value #83936
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix WaitForExitAsync could return a cancelled task #85882
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Ensure that the shuffle zero mask copies all bits #86453
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Adapt Tarjan generic cycle detector for use in Crossgen2 #71426
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • Fix crossgen2.pdb #86512
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
